text: Hi! Would anyone be able to help with integrating our stripe payment info to HubSpot so we can set up certain workflows and triggers to our customer base? for ex) emailing customers who haven't purchased in awhile, email after purchases, upsell emails & ads etc. we haven't been able to make it work for the direct integration #stripe <#C2YHAHB6K|api>
For a pretty simple integration you should checkout zaybra: <https://www.zaybra.com/>
